Package com.fortisbank.contracts.models.accounts

Class CreditAccount

java.lang.Object
com.fortisbank.contracts.models.accounts.Account
com.fortisbank.contracts.models.accounts.CreditAccount
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterestBearingAccount, Serializable
public class CreditAccount extends Account implements InterestBearingAccount
Class representing a credit account. Extends the Account class and implements the InterestBearingAccount interface.

      Constructor initializing a credit account with specified values.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - the account number
      customer - the customer who owns the account
      openedDate - the date when the account was opened
      creditLimit - the credit limit of the account
      interestRate - the interest rate applied to the account

    • isEligibleForInterestCalculation

      public boolean isEligibleForInterestCalculation()
      Checks if the account is eligible for interest calculation. Monthly interest should only be applied once per calendar month.
      Specified by:
      isEligibleForInterestCalculation in interface InterestBearingAccount
      Returns:
      true if eligible for interest calculation, false otherwise
